distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from out_patent
order by ${orderByClause}

#{zxcyej,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXCYSJ = #{zxcysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYZCS = #{byzcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BFMRYYCS = #{bfmryycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BSCYYYCS = #{bscyyycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZYCS = #{zycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYCS = #{tycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQRDM = #{sqrdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGHDMC = #{jghdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSWTHYYXG = #{jswthyyxg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMDHHXFA = #{fmdhhxfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YT = #{yt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE1 = #{define1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE2 = #{define2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE3 = #{define3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE4 = #{define4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHY = #{zhy,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FLZTLSXX = #{flztlsxx,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update out_patent set SQH = #{sqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQRI = #{sqri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMMC = #{fmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GKH = #{gkh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GKR = #{gkr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WXLX = #{wxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHENQR = #{shenqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMR = #{fmr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQRDZ = #{sqrdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DLR = #{dlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DLJG = #{dljg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBDM = #{gbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPCFLH = #{ipcflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPCFLH = #{cpcflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LJNFLH = #{ljnflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXQH = #{yxqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXQR = #{yxqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DQFLZT = #{dqflzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLZTGGRQ = #{flztggrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLZTYJ = #{flztyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLZTEJ = #{flztej,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOUQR = #{shouqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQGGH = #{sqggh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZSH = #{zsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZLQR = #{zlqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZLH = #{zlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QLYQ = #{qlyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZLPDF = #{zlpdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCYJTZSFWR = #{scyjtzsfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCYJDFR = #{scyjdfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCYJBZR = #{scyjbzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZTZFFWR = #{bztzffwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BHTZSFWR = #{bhtzsfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSQQR = #{fsqqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSSLFWR = #{fsslfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFGCWJ = #{dfgcwj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQBZ = #{sqbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RKSJ = #{rksj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMJJHYML = #{gmjjhyml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMJJHYDL = #{gmjjhydl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMJJHYZL = #{gmjjhyzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXCYYJ = #{zxcyyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXCYEJ = #{zxcyej,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXCYSJ = #{zxcysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYZCS = #{byzcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BFMRYYCS = #{bfmryycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BSCYYYCS = #{bscyyycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZYCS = #{zycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYCS = #{tycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQRDM = #{sqrdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGHDMC = #{jghdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSWTHYYXG = #{jswthyyxg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMDHHXFA = #{fmdhhxfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YT = #{yt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE1 = #{define1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE2 = #{define2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE3 = #{define3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE4 = #{define4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into out_patent (data_id, SQH, SQRI, FMMC, ZHY, GKH, GKR, WXLX, SHENQR, FMR, SQRDZ, DLR, DLJG, GBDM, IPCFLH, CPCFLH, LJNFLH, YXQH, YXQR, DQFLZT, FLZTLSXX, FLZTGGRQ, FLZTYJ, FLZTEJ, SHOUQR, SQGGH, ZSH, ZLQR, ZLH, QLYQ, ZLPDF, SCYJTZSFWR, SCYJDFR, SCYJBZR, BZTZFFWR, BHTZSFWR, FSQQR, FSSLFWR, DFGCWJ, SQBZ, RKSJ, GMJJHYML, GMJJHYDL, GMJJHYZL, ZXCYYJ, ZXCYEJ, ZXCYSJ, BYZCS, BFMRYYCS, BSCYYYCS, ZYCS, TYCS, SQRDM, JGHDMC, JSWTHYYXG, FMDHHXFA, YT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, REMARKS, STATUS) values
(#{patent.dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.fmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zhy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gkh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gkr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.wxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.shenqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.fmr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqrdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.dlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.dljg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.ipcflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.cpcflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.ljnflh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.yxqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.yxqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.dqflzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.flztlsxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.flztggrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.flztyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.flztej,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.shouqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqggh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zlqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.qlyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zlpdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.scyjtzsfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.scyjdfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.scyjbzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.bztzffwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.bhtzsfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.fsqqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.fsslfwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.dfgcwj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.rksj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gmjjhyml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gmjjhydl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.gmjjhyzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zxcyyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zxcyej,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zxcysj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.byzcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.bfmryycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.bscyyycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.zycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.tycs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.sqrdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.jghdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.jswthyyxg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.fmdhhxfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.yt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patent.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patent.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select sum(case when LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) = '2018' then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case when LEFT(SQRI,4) = '2018' then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, WXLX from out_patent WHERE STATUS is not null and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权' GROUP BY WXLX

select sum(case LEFT(WXLX,12) when '发明授权' then 1 else 0 end) as fmsqsl, sum(case LEFT(WXLX,12) when '外观设计' then 1 else 0 end) as wgsjsl, sum(case LEFT(WXLX,12) when '实用新型' then 1 else 0 end) as syxxsl, SUBSTR(STATUS,4) as lx from out_patent WHERE STATUS is not null and LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) = #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权' GROUP BY STATUS

select sum(case LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case LEFT(SQRI,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, '研发中心' as unitType from out_patent WHERE SHENQR like '%中心%' and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权'
union all select sum(case LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case LEFT(SQRI,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, '集团单位' as unitType from out_patent WHERE SHENQR like '%集团%' and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权'
union all select sum(case LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case LEFT(SQRI,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, '直属研究院' as unitType from out_patent WHERE SHENQR like '%研究院%' and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权'
union all select sum(case LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case LEFT(SQRI,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, '股份分公司' as unitType from out_patent WHERE SHENQR like '%分公司%' and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权'
union all select sum(case LEFT(FLZTGGRQ,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case LEFT(SQRI,4) when #{nd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, '外部单位' as unitType from out_patent WHERE SHENQR like '%大学%' and flztyj = '有效' and flztej = '授权'

select sum(case when LEFT(SQRI,4)='2017' then 1 else 0 end) as sqsl, sum(case when LEFT(SHOUQR,4)='2017' then 1 else 0 end) as shouqsl, sum(case when LEFT(SHOUQR,4)='2017' and WXLX = '发明授权' then 1 else 0 end) as fmsqsl, sum(case when LEFT(SHOUQR,4)='2014' and WXLX = '发明授权' then 1 else 0 end) as fmshouqsl, SUBSTR(STATUS,4) as lx from out_patent WHERE STATUS is not null and FLZTYJ = '有效' GROUP BY SUBSTR(STATUS,4)

select sum(case when LEFT(SHOUQR,4) = '2015' then 1 else 0 end) as agreeCount, sum(case when LEFT(SQRI,4) = '2015' then 1 else 0 end) as applyCount, SUBSTR(STATUS,4) as lx from out_patent WHERE STATUS is not null and flztyj = '有效' and (WXLX = '发明公布' or WXLX = '发明授权') GROUP BY STATUS
